mainSequence.step: Web receives Request and forwards to Server
Server communicates with Database to retrieve account details
Database sends account details back to Server
Server presents updated account details to Web
Web displays account details form to Moderator
Moderator Inputs updated account details in Web Interface
Updated details are submitted by Web to the Server
Server updates information in the Database
Database confirms successful update back to Server
Server acknowledges successful account update to Web
Web shows update success message to the Moderator
